column4: I need help with a specific graphics problem can anyone help me?
I need help with a specific graphics problem can anyone help me?
state the problem, we'll see what we can do
Well when I am using my graphics card for say video, and moving windows around the screen
There are lines like the window is being sliced and the move is getting spilt
Its stock with the HP G60 121WM
did you install the proper restricted driver for the card ?
try turning it off, see if it gets better,  the point is not to have it off all the time but to narrow down the problem
Ok, I turned desktop effects off and nothing
what do you mean nothing ?  and can yo use my nick when talking to me please it helps keep track
I am still having the problem is what I mean
how big is the videoyou are playing ? and what player are you using ,  also I don't allow pm,  talk to me in the channel
